name: Tim Banks is a little pear-shaped thing

content.html: I’m a world class Brazilian jiu-jitsu competitor. I train jiujitsu & lift weights daily. My cardio lets me grapple for an hour or more nonstop. My resting heart rate is in the mid 50s bpm. Yet, I’m still shaped like this. Feel free to come to my gym & tell me how sedentary I am.
content.value:
I’m a world class Brazilian jiu-jitsu competitor. I train jiujitsu & lift weights daily. My cardio lets me grapple for an hour or more nonstop. My resting heart rate is in the mid 50s bpm. Yet, I’m still shaped like this.
Feel free to come to my gym & tell me how sedentary I am.
